mapper.select: select r_num, b_num, r_name, r_content, r_pwd, to_char(r_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as r_date from spring_reply where b_num = #{b_num} order by r_num desc
mapper.update: /* Reply - replyUpdate */ update spring_reply set r_content=#{r_content}, r_date = sysdate where r_num = #{r_num}
mapper.delete: /* Reply - replyDelete */ delete from spring_reply where r_num =#{r_num}
/* Reply - replyChoiceDelete */ delete from spring_reply where b_num = #()
